summary.span: Definiert die Schnittstelle der folgenden STL/CLR-Objekte: hash_map, hash_multimap, hash_set und hash_multiset.

param.span: Ein bidirektionaler Iterator, der das erste Element der kontrollierten Sequenz oder die Position unmittelbar nach dem Ende einer leeren Sequenz bestimmt.

span.span: A bidirectional iterator that designates the first element of the controlled sequence, or just beyond the end of an empty sequence.

span.span: You use it to obtain an iterator that designates the beginning of the controlled sequence, but its status can change if the length of the controlled sequence changes.

summary.span: Legt den Anfang der kontrollierten Sequenz fest.

span.span: Designates the beginning of the controlled sequence.
An iterator.

span.span: A pair of values X. If X.second is , X.first designates the newly inserted element; otherwise X.first designates an element with equivalent ordering that already exists, and no new element is inserted.

returns.span: Der Delegat, mit dem die kontrollierte Sequenz sortiert wird.

span.span: The ordering delegate that is used to order the controlled sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [Hash\_Map:: value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-map-stl-clr#value_comp), [Hash\_multimap:: value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-multimap-stl-clr#value_comp), [Hash\_Set:: value_comp (STL/CLR) ](/cpp/dotnet/hash-set-stl-clr#value_comp), und [Hash\_multiset:: value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-multiset-stl-clr#value_comp).For more information, see [hash\_map::value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-map-stl-clr#value_comp), [hash\_multimap::value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-multimap-stl-clr#value_comp), [hash\_set::value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-set-stl-clr#value_comp), and [hash\_multiset::value_comp (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/hash-multiset-stl-clr#value_comp).
